sentences: Vasak käsi on paremast käest nõrgem.
context: The Estonian word 'vasak' is an adjective that means 'left' as in the opposite of right. It's used to describe body parts (left hand, left foot), directions (turn left), sides (left side), and can also have political connotations referring to left-wing views or parties. In physical contexts, it refers to anything located on the heart/soul side when facing someone.
